content:
I've posted some questions about the VitalSIgns profiles to the VitalSIgns stream, but is is a rather dead stream. Maybe I should have asked them in this Patient Care stream. Could someone move them to this stream for me please?
They are

  • https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/235632-Vital-Signs/topic/VitalSigns.20slice.20category.3AVSCat.20is.20strange
  • https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/235632-Vital-Signs/topic/Must.20Support.20on.20VitalSigns.2Ecomponent.20in.20wrong.20place
  • https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/235632-Vital-Signs/topic/Use.20of.20Must.20Support.20in.20VitalSigns.20varies

I believe the base FHIR VitalSigns profile (e.g. http://build.fhir.org/observation-vitalsigns.html) is owned by OO per the banner at the top of the page. Thus, if you want PC input, then I can add these questions to our next agenda, but PC wouldn't be able to vote on any changes.

Thanks Michelle. I traced the Zulip stream rather than looking at the profile itself :rolling_eyes:
I'll ask OO.
Richard Townley-O'Neill has marked this topic as resolved.
